types.builder_hover: A person who builds, creates and takes initiative
types.seeker_hover: A person seeking meaning and new perspectives
types.giver_hover: A person who supports others and offers help
types.connector_hover: A person who brings people together
types.dependent_hover: Someone who often relies on others for support
types.escaper_hover: Someone who avoids or withdraws from stress
types.giving_beyond_hover: Actions that go beyond personal contribution
types.problem_carrier_hover: Someone who takes on or internalizes others' problems
types.rebooter_hover: A person who restarts and reframes situations
types.solo_hover: A person who values independence and solitude
